(esp. of machines) to make a soft, continuous sound like a wheel turning very quickly: I could hear the dishwasher whirring in the kitchen. whir noun [ C usually sing ] us
Your browser doesn't support HTML5 audio
/hwɜr, wɜr/ (also whirr)
There was a whir of wings as the ducks rose up into the air.
